name: hide_show_sprite
description: Hide the sprite first, then show it after 2 seconds
instruction: Starting from an empty Scratch project with a single default sprite named 'Sprite1', you should complete the following: when the green flag is clicked, hide 'Sprite1' immediately, wait 2 seconds, then show 'Sprite1' again.

evaluation.description: Evaluates whether the sprite hides first, then shows after about 2 seconds (1.5â€“2.5s window). The test listens for visibility changes and passes if the correct hide-then-show sequence occurs in the expected timing.
